revision.comment: Added screen category to the article.
revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
'''[[Structs:Screen|Screen]]'''
native static int, int, int, int '''GetClipRect'''()
== Usage == Used to retrieve information about the current clipping rectangle if one is set.
=== Return value === Returns four values in this order: *The real pixel x offset of the current clipping rectangle *The real pixel y offset of the current clipping rectangle *The real pixel width of the current clipping rectangle *The real pixel height of the current clipping rectangle
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:Screen]]
